sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Procter & Gamble ( PG ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 3.5%.
Year to date, Procter & Gamble has lost about 1.7% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is JPMorgan Chase ( JPM ), trading down 1.2%.
JPMorgan Chase is lower by about 2.6% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Chevron ( CVX ), trading down 1.1%, and Pfizer ( PFE ), trading up 1.1% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
